# standardAppearance

**Instance Property**

The appearance settings for a tab bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var standardAppearance: UITabBarAppearance? { get set }
```

## Discussion

When a tab bar displays the selected item, the appearance setting in this property overrides the settings in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar/standardAppearance] property of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar].

Use this property to apply a tab bar appearance based on the tab bar item stored in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBar/selectedItem] property. If the selected item’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITabBarItem/standardAppearance] property is `nil`, UIKit uses the tab bar’s standard appearance.

## Configuring the item’s appearance

- **selectedImage**: The source image the item uses to generate its selected image.
- **scrollEdgeAppearance**: The appearance settings for the tab bar when the edge of scrollable content aligns with the edge of the tab bar.
- **titlePositionAdjustment**: The offset to apply to the title’s position.
